name: Save City R
description:
Introducing "Save City R" - an exciting game in which you take on the role of a tank commander on a mission to destroy the tanks of a well-known criminal organization known as "Shai Guu".
The player will have to control a tank that has two types of fire: large-caliber from the main gun, and a machine gun. According to the plot, a tank controlled by the player is landed on a city bridge, which is captured by enemy tanks. You need to destroy them using your skills and the weapons on board the tank.
For years, this nefarious group has instilled fear in the hearts of the country's inhabitants, and now it's up to you to restore peace and justice.

Key Features:

  • Epic Tank Battles: Take command of powerful tank and engage in intense battles against Shai Guu's forces. Utilize strategy, precision, and teamwork to outmaneuver your enemies, unleash devastating firepower, and emerge victorious.
  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in the visually stunning world of Save City R, brought to life with detailed environments, realistic tank physics, and jaw-dropping special effects.

Join the fight on the bridge in Save City R and become the beacon of hope for the oppressed citizens of the city. Prepare for adrenaline-fueled tank battles, heart-pounding moments. Will you answer the call and save City R?
